text: Selena Gomez broke some big news this week as she revealed in May she had a kidney transplant due to Lupus. Soon after her 127m followers showered her with notes wishing her well. Several asked tough questions while others offered their own stories. The attention may have been too much for the Fetish hit maker as she was seen with her head down when running errands in New York City on Saturday.
